00047 URef< GrPixelBuffer >
00048 GrPixelBufferMgr::CreatePixelBuffer( unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00049                                                                          GrPixelBuffer::EFORMAT format, GrPixelBuffer::EUSAGE usage )
00050 {
00052         GrPixelBuffer* buf = new GrPixelBuffer( width, height, format, usage );
00053 
00055         _pixelBuffers.AddItem( buf );
00056         return buf;
00057 }

00067 void
00068 GrPixelBufferMgr::PreContextReset()
00069 {
00071         CollectGarbage();
00072 
00074         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _pixelBuffers.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00075                 _pixelBuffers[ i ]->PreContextReset();
00076 }
00077

00079 void
